title: Border, ca. 1955
description: Surrealist image: composed of varying sized birds, one group of three flying, one sitting on harp, and another in a cage. A large branch, suspended in mid-air, supports the harp, birdcage and a long flowing drapery. Printed in rust, black, yellow green and white on blue ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, ca. 1955.
ca. 1955. Machine-printed. Gift of Scalamandre. 1990-84-98.
